sources.name: sourceStg
sources.description: Import data from Stage table SEATTLE_PET_TABLE

transformations.name: aggregateBreedKeys
transformations.description: Aggregate data by 'SPECIES, PRIMARYBREED, SECONDARYBREED, MAXBREEDSK' producing Columns

transformations.name: joinToTarget
transformations.description: Left Outer Join on aggregateBreedKey and SourceBreedDim

transformations.name: filterExistingRows
transformations.description: Filter rows using expression on column 'SPECIES_NAME, PRIMARY_BREED_NAME,SECONDARY_BREED_NAME'

transformations.name: surrogateKey
transformations.description: Adding new key RowNum starting from 1 with step 1

scriptLines: query: 'SELECT NVL(MAX(BREED_SK),0) as MaxBreedSK FROM SEATTLE_PET_LICENSE_SCHEMA.BREED_DIM',
query: 'SELECT NVL(MAX(PET_LIC_SK),0) AS MAX_LIC FROM SEATTLE_PET_LICENSE_SCHEMA.PET_LIC_FCT',
